title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-15 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-15 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

Secs. 301.2, 322.1, 322.2 F.C.A. Form
3-15
(Juvenile Delinquency)
7/83
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________
In the Matter of Docket No. ________
________ NOTICE OF HEARING
A Person Alleged to be a

Juvenile Delinquent, ________ Respondent. ________
TO:________
PLEASE TAKE NOTICE, that a hearing
pursuant to section
322.2
of the

Family Court Act will be held at this Court at ________, on ________, 19
________, or as soon thereafter as counsel can be heard, to determine
[FN1]
____________
____________
and for such other further relief as to
the Court may seem just and proper. Yours, etc. Dated: ________, 19________. ________
[FN1] Insert purpose of hearing. See
301.2(13), 322.1, 322.2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency

Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form
3-15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
